atkVestingAirdropImplementation().details: This function is expected to be available on the factory contract. It's typically created automatically if the factory has a public state variable named `atkVestingAirdropImplementation`.

create(address,bytes32,address,address,u.details: This function is expected to be available on the factory contract. It's typically created automatically if the factory has a public state variable named `atkVestingAirdropImplementation`.

params.initializationDeadline: The timestamp after which no new vesting can be initialized.
params.owner: The initial owner of the contract.
params.root: The Merkle root for verifying claims.
params.token: The address of the ERC20 token to be distributed.
params.vestingStrategy: The address of the vesting strategy contract for vesting calculations.

returns.predictedAddress: The predicted address of the vesting airdrop proxy.

allAirdropsLength().notice: Returns the total number of vesting airdrop proxy contracts created by this factory.

atkVestingAirdropImplementation().notice: Returns the address of the current ATKVestingAirdrop logic contract (implementation).

create(address,bytes32,address,address,u.notice: Creates a new ATKVestingAirdrop proxy contract.

predictVestingAirdropAddress(address,byt.notice: Predicts the deployment address of a vesting airdrop proxy.

allAirdropsLength().notice: Returns the total number of vesting airdrop proxy contracts created by this factory.

atkVestingAirdropImplementation().notice: Returns the address of the current ATKVestingAirdrop logic contract (implementation).

create(address,bytes32,address,address,u.notice: Creates a new ATKVestingAirdrop proxy contract.

predictVestingAirdropAddress(address,byt.notice: Predicts the deployment address of a vesting airdrop proxy.

ATKVestingAirdropCreated(address,address.notice: Emitted when a new `ATKVestingAirdrop` proxy contract is successfully created and deployed.

InvalidAddress().notice: Custom error for invalid address parameter.

InvalidImplementation().notice: Custom error for invalid implementation address.

SameAddress().notice: Custom error when attempting to set the same address.

userdoc.notice: This interface defines the functions for creating and managing ATK vesting airdrop contracts.

atkVestingAirdropImplementation().details: This function is expected to be available on the factory contract. It's typically created automatically if the factory has a public state variable named `atkVestingAirdropImplementation`.

create(address,bytes32,address,address,u.details: This function is expected to be available on the factory contract. It's typically created automatically if the factory has a public state variable named `atkVestingAirdropImplementation`.

params.initializationDeadline: The timestamp after which no new vesting can be initialized.
params.owner: The initial owner of the contract.
params.root: The Merkle root for verifying claims.
params.token: The address of the ERC20 token to be distributed.
params.vestingStrategy: The address of the vesting strategy contract for vesting calculations.

returns.predictedAddress: The predicted address of the vesting airdrop proxy.

params.airdrop: The address of the newly deployed `ATKVestingAirdropProxy` contract.
params.creator: The address that initiated the creation of the airdrop proxy.

params.newImplementation: The address of the new implementation contract.
params.oldImplementation: The address of the previous implementation contract.

devdoc.title: Interface for ATK Vesting Airdrop Factory
